Posts.Content: Hi, I’m really struggling with the after cancer treatment. I was diagnosed with breast cancer in February 2018. i’m extremely tired, more then what I was when going through treatments. my body is in constant pain, my bones & joints. I’m a fitness instructor so exercise has continued throughout. Hiw are you coping??
Posts.Title: After treatment is done

Posts.Content: Thank you for the reply Carolyn  my self confidence & self esteem is zero now. i wear baggy clothes all the time. can’t be bothered with anything. perhaps a conversation with my oncologist next time about the drugs.
Posts.Title: After treatment is done
